content:
You're welcome! It sounds like you've got a great plan in place for your visit to Smokey's. The brisket, baked beans, and coleslaw will make for a delicious and well-rounded meal. Don't forget to ask the pitmaster about their smoking process and wood selection - I'm sure you'll learn some valuable tips and insights to apply to your own BBQ adventures!

Remember to take your time, enjoy the atmosphere, and savor the flavors. BBQ is all about the experience, so be sure to soak it all in! If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask.

Have a fantastic time at Smokey's, and I hope your BBQ skills continue to improve with each new adventure!
